description: This Python script demonstrates the usage of an Agent class with OpenAI models for reasoning tasks, including configuring reasoning models and printing responses for generating steps to write a Fibonacci series script.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent that interacts with language models.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and display a response based on a prompt, with options for streaming and full reasoning display.
